content.detailedDescription:
Me and my room mate were driving down highway 183 south from breckenridge, we were about to cross the county line into eastland county. when we both noticed an object in the sky that we thought was a plane. what caught our eye at first was that it was flashing a white light, like a strobe light, but slower in intervals. we watched it for a minute at the most then on it's last flash it tilted upward then vanished. 

i slapped my room mate on the arm and asked him if he saw the same thing. he agreed. it was one of the few that we have seen. mostly we see them at night but this was special because it was blantley during the day light hours. there was no sound, we waited for the 'boom' incase it was an f-16 going super sonic but none. we looked in the sky further to see if it had gone to another location in the sky but it had not appeared again.


the motions of the object was smooth, floating but moving very fast towards the south. it wasn't far up in the sky couldn't have been more than 1500 feet up.

we spoke about it for a few minutes, both of us were shocked but not surprised that we had finally saw one during the day. then we started talking about the other ufo's we had seen. and we thought we should report it and most likely will not be the last report we make. 

thanks for your time.

j  &  r
content.summary: Silver, oval shaped flying object that was flashing in the sky then vanished.

content.detailedDescription: I woke up around 3-3:30 &started to get up to go to the bathroom& i laid back down when i saw something flying very low and slowly outside across the street over the neighboring houses. i tried to wake up my husband and he would not get up. this thing looked like it flew even lower and was coming down the street towards towards my house. i was too scared to get up so i layed there and hoped it was gone. it had to be close because light filtered into my room. at first i thought it was a helicopter but there was no noise and it was way to bright with a bluish light. i fell asleep right after that i think and then i woke up again at about 4:30 and things seemed normal so i went to the bathroom. what was it? anyone else see it?
content.summary: I woke up and saw a large,extremely bright flying object through my bedroom window.

content.detailedDescription:
My dad had just pulled into the driveway, my mom and were on the small front poarch to greet him.The dog we had started to bark at the sky and we looked up--it was quiet and no sound at all-usually we heard lots of planes from the navy bases around us.
 when my dad looked up he told my mom to take me in the house but i wanted to stay and see too. all 3 of us watched thse discs fly very slowly,go back from the direction they came and go past us again--.
  they were at cloud level- passing in front and thru them.
both my parents didt say very much to me-- but we went into the house locked all the doors and windows,and this was summer time i remember we
were very warm.  no lights of any kind were turned on and we slept with a 
with out a light.Nothing was ever said about this until many years later
after my dad had died and my mom and i sat for many hours talking of this--i really believe we have had and are having visits and i just want to know if possibles is there any explanation for what i saw.
content.summary: 5 discs flying in formation at just about sundown comingfrom direction of cecilfield nas

content.detailedDescription:
I saw 10 bright lights in the sky in two formations of 5 lights each plus a few dim scattered lights. all were moving from south to north very slowly and without noise. there was a partial moon off to my left somewhere and the lights were in a clear path. i could see the light moving relative to the stars above but there was no blocking of starlight. the lights were all distinct. no object could be seen, just moving lights. the formation shapes follow.

   *        *          *        *

                 *                  *  2 formations moving to the north.

   *        *          *        *

the ten lights were white and some varied very slightly in brightness but all were as bright as jupiter or venus when those planets are at their brightest. the few dim white lights were almost unseen except when i looked away and saw them at the edge of my direct line of sight. there were 3 to 6 of the dim lights.

all lights stayed at the same positions relative to each other and moved slowly to the north until they went into a south moving cloud formation.

it almost seemed like two aircraft carriers lined up with fighter escorts that stayed put relative to the each other and the two capital ships.

from the point of one formation to the back covered about 20 degrees of my line of sight. today, 2-16-09, i used a drafting adjustable triangle held about a foot from my face and adjusted the angle until it appeared to line up with the leading light to the back lights, as i recalled them. i locked the adjustable triangle and read approximately 20 degrees of azimuth for one formation of five. both formations were identical. elevation was about 60 degrees and ascertained with the same drafting tool.

i saw the lights through my bedroom window and screen, then just the screen, then just the open air without any changes in the scene above.

there was a severe wind blowing from the north and my home faces south. my bedroom window faces west.
content.summary: Saw 10 bright lights in sky in formations of  5 each plus a few dim lights moving from south to north very slowly without noise.

content.detailedDescription: I woke up around 3-3:30 &started to get up to go to the bathroom& i laid back down when i saw something flying very low and slowly outside across the street over the neighboring houses. i tried to wake up my husband and he would not get up. this thing looked like it flew even lower and was coming down the street towards towards my house. i was too scared to get up so i layed there and hoped it was gone. it had to be close because light filtered into my room. at first i thought it was a helicopter but there was no noise and it was way to bright with a bluish light. i fell asleep right after that i think and then i woke up again at about 4:30 and things seemed normal so i went to the bathroom. what was it? anyone else see it?
content.summary: I woke up and saw a large,extremely bright flying object through my bedroom window.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving back to my home in tallahassee, traveling east on i-10 on 02/04/09 having just picked up my car from a repair shop in quincy, fl.  the receipt from the shop is timed at 1:34:59 pm.  i had been on the road maybe 10 minutes. it was fairly cold out and the sky was a beautiful blue and clear of clouds.  something in the sky ahead and a bit north of the interstate caught my attention.  i immediately took my foot off the accelerator and focused my attention on this object.  at arms length, it was the size of my pinkie fingernail, white in color and shaped sort of like a wedge but with curved edges.  there were no wings or exhaust and it seemed to be fairly low - maybe 500 feet.  i watched it steadily travel north for about 10 seconds trying to figure out what i was looking at.  it then just disappeared, vanished.  a few seconds later, it appeared again, just a bit north of where it vanished.  it stayed visible for maybe 2 seconds and disappeared again, and did not reappear.  i know it was not a plane, helicopter, bird, kite, or balloon.  the only possibility i have thought of is an iridium flare.  is it possible to see one during the day?  and do they vanish and then reappear?
content.summary: Wedge shaped object appeared and then disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
I found a youtube video that looks similar to the austin, texas fireball of february 15, 2009.  it is tape case 347.

http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=x0bifypqqje
content.summary: Similar to austin fireball

content.detailedDescription: I was trying a new camera and took some photos of the sky the day before and photographed airplanes passing above my balcony. the next day i was at the balcony smoking a cigarette and saw this light coming from south to north over the sea to my left (east). i grabbed the camera and took 3 photos, it was fast. i downloaded and what i saw was just a smudge, but i saw something odd! i'm attaching the pictures maybe with some software you can see it better, thanks.
content.summary: Very bright (daytime) sphere flying very high and fast.

content.detailedDescription: I was in the passenger seat driving through coconut grove when i saw a shiny silver orb/sphere object in the sky at a distance. the skies were a clear blue so the object stood out. i saw it over the trees but when we passed taller trees it became shielded. however as we drove forward and were past the tall tress, the object was no longer visible. if it had been a regular aircraft, it should have remained traveling in one direction or another as we passed the tress, but this one just disappeared completely from view.
content.summary: Silver orb spotted over the miami dade county area, lasting only a few seconds

content.detailedDescription: I attended the drive in movie theater near wallwer tx at 7 pm sunday nite..After aprox. 1 hour i noticed a large ball of light in the western sky.. it lit up the sky,...It was a radiant light in the shape of a sphere but in the middle it was shaped like a crescent..The object didnt appear to be moving. i kept watchin it for approx 1 hour 20 min..I had went to the snack shack to get a coke and when i came out the light was gone...It wasnt a star ill tell u that. iwas at least 15 times brighter than any star in the sky...There were also commerical air planes in the sky. this was no plane
content.summary: I saw a very large light in the sky it remained for an hour and a half

content.detailedDescription: Not sure what we saw yesterday. obscured by trees. my friend and i were walking north on avenue g at intersection of 42nd street. observed a large object falling from the sky with a long bright red trail, moving far too slow to be a comet or meteor (conjecture). when we arrived at our destination, a coffee shop a few blocks away, i asked if anyone there had observed the object. one girl came rushing over and said she was the only person present who saw it. said she was glad someone else saw it, because she thought she might just have imagined it. i can see why she would have thought that. it looked like something out of an old black and white sci-fi flick.
content.summary: Brilliant fireball north of austin, falling from east to west from our perspective (veiwed from hyde park)

content.detailedDescription: Dark sphere with helicopter on web cam both were gone in the next photo. more at http://webcamufo.Com
content.summary: Dark sphere with helicopter on web cam more at http://webcamufo.Com

content.detailedDescription:
Was heading south on indiana sr 52, having just gone through the stoplight at cr300 and sr 52 intersect, several businesses are located to the east side of parallel with sr 52. when a brilliant blue flash horizontal to the
ground appeared right over the road in front of me, lighting up the entire area with the intensity of a welder arc, but a magnitude of of a camera flash -almost plasma like. the flash lasted about 3 to 4 seconds and looked not unlike a flame often found painted on custom cars, the flame was estimated to be between 75 to a hundred yards in length, with a width of about 25 to 30 yards, it was traveling west to east, its appearance was instant and size was constant. weather conditions in the lafayette in area were extreme at the time, with high winds from the west, with sustained winds estimated at 25 to 35 mph, with gust up to 60 mph, a severe storm cell was going through with heavy rain blinding at times, but the worst of the storm was to the north of my location, being on the edge of the storm. the flash was estimated to be about 50 to 70 feet in elevation from the ground.
there were multiple vehicles in and about the area heading in both directions on sr 52, with a van and a car directly under the area where the flash occurred. was not intimidated by the incident, but am concerned by it.
as an avid outdoorsman having spent much time in the field have never seen an anomaly such as this. the object or flash disappeared as rapidly as it appeared.
content.summary: Brilliant blue flash, horizontal to the ground on state road 52 south, lafayette in,  with the intensity of a camera flash.

content.detailedDescription: I went outside my house at 11:20pm to get something out of my car. i always look up at the night sky as a hobby and right above me, while i was facing north, i saw a very large amber colored skinny oval object moving silently from west to east. i am used to seeing these objects out here and i know they are ufo's, i watch each one regardless. this one  looked to be about 1,000 feet up and judging from the height i would guess it was about as large as a house. i backed up to the street and watched it continue east until it faded away. total time seemed like 5 minutes. when i was about to walk back inside, i saw another object following the same path as the first one that was a brilliant white triangle shape and was much larger than the first one, about twice the size. it moved very slow. too slow for any known aircraft to stay in the air. it was not a helicopter. it made no sound. it stayed on the same course as the first object and i felt like i watched it for about 3 minutes or so. i looked down to hook my car keys on my belt loop instead of holding them and when i looked back up it was gone. i stayed outside for about another 5 minutes looking at the sky for anything else but didn't see anything. when i went back inside my house and looked at the clock, an hour and a half had passed as it was already 12:37am. i know i was outside for no more than 15 minutes. i have never seen a triangular ufo out here. i did once in kentucky years ago when i was 13 in 1993. i had a experience there, but never out here. i seem to have had a loss in time which i will have to investigate.
content.summary: Amber oval ufo crossing sky followed by a white triangle

content.detailedDescription: Valentine's day 2009 at 0900, i was driving to the gym when i looked up at a stoplight. i saw what looked like 30 or 40 mettalic and see-through fluttering wings. they looked liked a flock of birds but they were not. these were metallic and kept going left and right. they were in formation, like one was a leader and the rest following. they also disappeared and reappeared. it was a sunny morning with some clouds. i stared at the fluttering objects for a good 15 seconds before it finally disappeared. they were probably about a hundred feet up in the air. again, these were not birds; they reminded me of a cross between crystals and something of a metallic nature. when the disappeared, it wasn't all at once, it was gradual disappearce within a spand of 2-3 seconds. i was in awe but at the same time felt starnge. btw, i don't drink or do drugs; i'm a health professional and instructor. no one knows about this, including my husband,even though i tell him everything. and i don't really know why i did not tell him about the incident i experienced.
content.summary: Driving to the gym when i looked up and i saw 'see through' metallic objects fluttering inteh skyn going left and right and disappearing and reappering and finally disappering

content.detailedDescription:
I was living at my parents home at the time, and attending computer school during the day and delivering food at night. so i would come home at night and eat and study. and as i enjoyed cigars i would go out side after words to have a cigar each night. i stepped out to have a cigar, i just looked up as i usually do and saw a object spinning  in a clock wise way.  it was almost directly over my head. it was very bright white light.  it was spinning really fast in a wobble type fashion. it was at arms length about ,1/2 the size of a dime.  i remember i could not believe what i was seeing, it was moving faster than anything i know of here on earth. i had forgotten my lighter just a few feet inside the door of the patio, i went in to grab it and came back out in a few seconds and it was still there. spinning, i remember being filled with a great feeling of excitement.  i was alone though..My elderly parents where asleep in side.  i decided i had to find some one to help me witness this.  i went in and shouted to my mother and father. they were fast asleep.  i came back out it was there still. i grabbed my cigar and just stared at this fantastic thing.  it was at this time that it began to move out of its spinning circle and started to fly in a south western direction. it was moving very fast, it was at this point that as i followed it heading up and away that it must have been up pretty high because i feel it  was being illuminated by the sun the whole while. i followed it as it became dimmer and smaller and head toward a arching direction  into outer space and then it was gone from my sight. 

this object was insight for well over five minutes to my best estimation.
it was a bright white light, i would think metal or made of some shinning properties, it was disk or round shaped.  it was spinning and wobbling in a way that it looked very different than any craft i had every seen.

regards
content.summary: Witnessed a spinning bright white object.

content.detailedDescription:
My best friend and i were hauling hay (the small square bails). due to the heat we would work at night and rest during the day. we had worked for a few hours and decided to take a short break. we were laying on the hood of his truck when i noticed a light going across the sky (deep sky, space). i said "look, a falling star!". we both watched waiting for it to burn out but it never did. it disappeared over the southern horizon (estimated). we kept watching the sky for something again when we noticed it had reappeared from the northern horizon again. i began counting... 1001, 1002, 1003... it was gone again over the southern horizon. wow! that was fast. i assumed we were seeing something in orbit that had a good reflection. we were now watching the northern horizon... several seconds later it appeared... 1001, 1002... it stopped dead in the middle of the sky. it just blended in with all the other stars. after several seconds, it made a series of zigzags going back and forth across the area in the middle of the sky, cris-crossing at times a previous path. all at the same speed it had originally traveled only stopping at starting without any affect on it's speed. it stopped in the middle of the sky once again... for several seconds... then went back the way it had came from the northern horizon... 1001, 1002... it was gone. we never saw it again! but i still remember all the details so well! i have always wanted to calculate the speed the it was traveling but never have.

the cover of popular mechanics this month is about ufos. i am a very analytical person. straight a's in school, no drinking, no drugs, very logical! if i had not seen this myself, i would be skeptical also, but i did see it, and know exactly what i saw! seems that the person writing the article has never actually seen anything like this. what i saw was no weather balloon, reflection from another object, or some other craft from earth. i know that the technology for this didn't exist in 1975, doesn't exist today, and will likely not exist in another 100 years on earth. to be able to travel that speed, cover thousands of miles starting and stopping with no acceleration or deceleration, is technology out in our distant future.
content.summary: Bright light in space traveling horizon to horizon in approx 4 seconds

content.detailedDescription: While traveling west in vehicle my wife and i observed large luminous circle which appeared to be falling extremely fast. the object stopped and traveled north we attempted to follow it on a side road but object changed direction south, i turned around and followed for 2-3 minutes on a south bound road object appeared to hover and pulsate thru the tree line with a slight green color around the edges. i turned my vehicle around and left the area quickly. when the object hovered i became very afraid and was compelled to leave the area quickly. my wife has been up to this moment been an avid skeptic of the unexplainable. she was trembling in fear. my wife and i did not have a camera in the car at the time.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Round and luminous white w/ slight hint of green glowing around edge

content.detailedDescription:
I was about 14-15 years old when this happened. i stayed overnight with a friend and we were lying awake and talking, i had been noticing an engine - like sound that i thought was a train in the distance. it was a slow rythmic intermittent sound. it was deep and low almost quiet and i never would have thought about it, but for some reason it hit me that it was closer than the train tracks. 

i got up to look out of the window after several minutes of hearing it and i saw a solid circle of light above the trees over a nearby park. i think it was yellow light (im colorblind) but travelling along the circle of light i could see a long patch of green light running the length of the circle. the green light seemed to go along with the sound of the engine. every time the light passed on my side, i could hear the engine and feel it vibrate the floor and windows. i could feel it in my body too. i could not see the actual shape of the ship because the night was very dark. if had to put a shape to it, id say it was a disk like shape from the lights it had. the park was only half a block away and this thing was alot larger that any helicopter i have ever seen. it covered almost the entire park.

i told my friend to get up when he asked what i was doing and he saw it too. we stood there at the window together, excited to see such a thing. it had individual red, yellow and blue lights in a group at its top that took turns blinking and i think white lights on the bottom of the ship. the ship sat above the trees over lyons park for about a minute or so, then the green light began to move faster around the yellow ring and the engine noise sped up. when the engine became a constant hum, the ship took off to the north east, then switched sharply to the north west. the ship moved so fast that it went from looming huge in the window to a pinpoint of light in the sky in about a second and a half at most. it left a trail (kind of like a sci fi movie) of light behind it that faded in a few seconds. 

we were excited while it was there, but i remember feeling panicked after it left. and for some reason, the next thing we both remember is being in the kitchen afraid they were coming for us. we both remember jumping out of the second floor window to go to the convenience store, but we never went to the convenience store. i remember running into the badminton net and falling over and laughing histerically after leaving the house. 

i do not remember how we got to the kitchen that night, or how we got back into the house. but we did not go to the convenience store. ive never felt like i was abducted, but everything was normal that night until i saw that ship.

we didnt talk about it for a long time, but we do occassionally bring it up to each other, just to remind ourselves that it did happen.

ive never reported this to anyone other than friends before, but i have always wanted to.

i am going to join mufon tonight, feel free to contact me through my email if i need to clarify anything.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: [cms/tg] a ship hovered over the park for several minutes before we realized it and stayed while we watched, then it left quickly

content.detailedDescription:
I was travelling down the birfield road, soutcote in reading on 15th february 2009 at exactly 7pm. when me and my mother saw a strange object in the sky. it was moving in very fast circular movements and hovered up and down whilst moving straight across the sky. it kind of looked like a jelly fish as it had a weird see through film around it and hovered in the sky like one. it was lower than a aircraft and moved completely different to one and was also slower approx 200 miles per hour!!! it looked like a fireball, kind of egg shaped but was very strange orangy, redy and yellowy in colour. it flew across the sky for about 2-3 minutes whilst i was heading towards and sat at a set of red lights. then after 2/3 mins it slowed down and then went straight into the sky and disappeared!

does anyone know what this is as it was very odd?!
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Fireball in the sky of reading

content.detailedDescription: My daughter and i were out fishing on the willamate river near canby oregon,about 3 hours into fishing i noticed a object north of myself but it kept "disapearing". finaly as i stood facing south watching my fishing pole tip i saw it again apear.I got out my bushnell binoculars,i take everywhere,and observed what was two orbs with a line connecting them,just like a barbell.The object was at extreamly high altitude and did move in a zig zag pattern when it moved.Then it was gone.Thought it was a star at first till ii looked with the binoculars.Nope no star! was the first time i have seen a object of this shape in person.I have had other sightings but they are all orbs.Single orbs.I have even got pics of hundreds of them,but nothing like this one.No pics sorry.But the time and date are exact.3.45 pm south of my location on 99 e.
content.summary: It looked exactly like a barbell.

content.detailedDescription: On a summers night in july of 1958 my brother and i were outside playing in our yard.  i was 12 years years old and he was ll at that time.  it was a clear evening and the sun had set below the horizon.  our house was located on the east side of a paved road.  to the west of us across the highway was located a plowed field about 300 feet wide and a quarter of a mile long.  the length of the field ran parallel with the highway.  on the other side of the field the terrain was raised and was a pasture for the farmer that lived on that side of the road.  a very few trees grew in that pasture so we could see to the west of us and had a good view facing west across the highway viewing the sky at about a 15 degree angle with little obstruction.  since the sun had set below the treeline and the sky was not yet black, we had a very good view of the event.  we observed a spherical to cylindrical orange to red object that seemed to float overhead that was approximately 1,000 feet in the air that appeared to come from the northeast at a speed of approximately 20-30 mph.  the object was totally silent.  the object appeared almost straight overhead of our position and moved to the southwest over the neighbor's field and pasture before finally disappearing over the treeline.  the sky was perfectly clear and their was no wind.  we had an unobstructed view of this object for approximately 30+ seconds.  we went into our house and reported what we had seen to our parents.  i remember this event like it was yesterday.  i can see the object in my mind as it floats across the sky and i can see my brother and i standing their watching the object.  i remember the conditions of the day and the absolute quiet of the evening.  i went to a family gathering this past summer and mentioned this event and my brother mentioned he too remembered this event and described the event as if i was reporting it.  i am level headed and  am skeptical of many things.  i served in vietnam as military policeman and am used to hostile situations.  this is my story.  my brother is a witness.
content.summary: Sighting occured at dusk with clear sky and no obstruction

content.detailedDescription: We were returning home from my parents house i99 towards bedford,pa to get on i70. i watched from the passenger window of the car at first thinking it was a planet that was visible. it wasnt one color the more you looked at it it appeared to be multi colored sorta rainbow like. it seemed to follow along the road and seemed stationary till i realised we pulled ahead of the light. at that point i had to look back over my shoulder to keep a fix on it. it was very very bright and even tho you couldnt see any other stars in the sky it stuck out almost looked like an airplane tower but there are none in that area. i watched it dim till it disappeared then gradually get brighter again it was hazy not cloudy and there were no other obstructions to block it. it did this on two different occasions. i watched this object for about 15 constant mins. till finally the trees blocked it out. we got home around 9-930 that nite and the sky was clear you could see all the stars but i could not find what i was looking at earlier. and we are not really that far geographically from where i seen this object earlier. i looked online to see if there were any planets visible that nite and the only one was venus but it would have been crescent shaped and this wasnt it was starlike. i dont know what it was a saw but it was very intense more then any other star or planet i have ever seen in the nite sky.
content.summary: Super bright starlike object seen while driving

content.detailedDescription:
Looking out front door southerly direction.
observed bite fire ball white hot with magenta core.
long tail very fast east to south plummet.
no sound. broken segmented contrail formed few seconds afterward.
disappeared over roof tops.
content.summary: Possible meteor or space debris.

content.detailedDescription: I was at work wednesday night 2/11/2009.  about 0400 thursday morning i stepped outside with a friend for a short smoke break.  we looked up into the sky to see if the weather was clear or cloudy.  it was partly cloudy, and as we looked up, we observed a bright light high up in the sky.  as we were looking up, the object moved rapidly to the west.  then it abruptly stopped, and moved back to the east near it's starting point.  from there it bobbled up and down for awhile before we lost sight of it behind cloud cover. there was no noise, but the object was very high.  at first, we thought it was a star, but when it moved like it did we knew it wasn't. we were almost in disbelief asking each other if we both witnessed the same thing.
content.summary: Bright light high in the sky moving west then abrupt turn to the east.

content.detailedDescription: At the time, i was making a routine delivery in downtown belleville, il. i stopped at the address, and after exiting the vehicle, made a quick scan of everything i could see from my position to the end of the street. it was probably around 9-10pm. the street in front of me ended in a t intersection. there was a home centered at the intersection point, on the far side of the intersecting street. there was a man and a boy in the front yard of this home. above the home i witnessed a triangular oject performing horizontal figure eights. at first i believed i was witnessing a kite with lights or a radio controlled toy. as i watched the object perform the horizontal eights, i began to grow a bit disturbed by the appearance of the man and boy tendning to something in the yard, with no visual signs that they were aware of the object that had at first appeared to me to be part of the scene, small, and assumedly over the house which i had a good estimate of the distance towards at the time. i realized that the object was no toy. it was a black triangle with white lights at each corner of its underside and a red rectangular light on the underside also at about a 2/3 mark from the tip to the base which had been flying this horizontal figure eight pattern with the underside and the lights facing towards me. it came out of this pattern and faced in my direction with its tip pointed towards me and made a very smooth lurch forward. the object was angled upwards a bit, and i could see that the rear of the triangle had a soft inward sweep to it. i began to feel that the object was fairly large and closer than i wanted it to be, but still maybe further away than i originally thought. the object was completely silent. the object proceded to stand straight up in the air, (i.E. a floating silent triangle facing me horizontally rotated its tip backwards until it was perfectly vertical exposing the now perpendicular underside). the object then began to rotate on its lowermost right corner, rotating clockwise, as if someone had affixed the very tip of the craft to a point in space and rotated the entire craft perfectly around that point. it made full revolutions in probably each each half second or so. the craft then angled itself back down to the approximate position it had been in before the manuvre, lurched foward, then back, then made shorter movements left, then right then back to center. i lost sight of the object as it descended behind the treeline which was in the rear of the house and which ran behind several of the neighboring houses. as the craft descended, i had a little better perspective on the size of the craft and the distance, as i could see the lights through its descent below the treeline. it was closer than i had previously thought and maybe a little smaller, as i had assumed it had a higher altitude, but was still quite large for its distance. through the whole thing i couldn't help but feel that i was being watched, or that it was simply observing the ground in its area. i remember at the end standing for a moment and just watching but there being nothing visible of the object. what followed were approximately five black or very dark helicopters flying in loose formation, performing fairly quietly and the lead of which at least i remember as having a massive searchlight on towards the ground. they were flying left to right through the same field of vision, just slightly higher than where the object had been, and passed the scene completely. i wondered later if the craft had moved elsewhere at a very low altitude, turned off all of its lights and hid or camouflaged itself somehow on the ground, or ascended again with its lights out while i was distracted? as strange as it sounds, after the helicopters had passed and there was no sign of the object, i still had a job to finish, so i made the delivery and headed back to work for the next. it took me a while to absorb how anomalous this occurance had been. i thought about reporting the incident to scott air force base but soon thought the better of it.
content.summary: Black triangle followed by black helicopters.

content.detailedDescription:
In july 1965, myself and two other persons saw a flying object at tree top level while at a job corp rural training center. the camp was in the hills/forest north of little rock, ca.

years later, while watching a television program hosted by larry king and area 51 as a back drop, a male caller, related the same story to mr. king.

     {pid}






{cms/jay/pid} text moved to narrative
content.summary: Object flying tree top level east-bount, no sound.

content.detailedDescription:
I use this site sometimes to check weather. http://weather.Msfc.Nasa.Gov/goes/goeseastconuswv.Html
i noticed what looked to be a disc in a few of the frames so i used print screen feature and pasted them to paint to get a closer look. when you zoom in on them you can see, as evidenced by the pixels, the anomalies are pasted.
content.summary: Doctored weather sattelite images.

content.detailedDescription:
Upon leaving the office and move 2 steps toward the edge of the sidewalk into the schoolyard, i started to watch in the sky 2 falling objects, approx. to 30/40 degrees towards the north (having as a reference point runway 09/27 of the international airport of tijuana "abelardo l. rodriguez (tij / mmtj) and a height not very well defined, but taking as reference the ground had an elevation angle of 60/70 degrees . objects were fireballs and had a trail of red /orange in color with no change in the tail aproximate size of the tail was 7 or 10 times larger than the object and not leaving a visible trail of smoke. at about 25 seconds of having initiated the sighting objects slowed down, immediately after it was observed that from the right hand object another object appeared being same size and color, almost inmediatedly after that objects changed course and speed, at that time i rushed to the second floor to get a better view because the objects were very near the tree top line and i was gonna loose then, i saw the third object was brighter than the other two, i moved towards one end of the building to get a better view but at that time the objects were in the tree top line and lost them. besides me, several kids of the school (it is a junior h.S. type school) and a couple of teachers saw them, one said that the third object suddenly disapeared. 
at first i though it was a couple of meteorites or space junk falling down but when they slowed down and changed course that idea went into the tube, i also thought they were skydivers with flares but later on at night while listening to the news on the radio it was reported that the san diego police dept. or the sheriff office did not knew also what was in the sky at that moment.
end of report.
content.summary: Looking out in a n-nw direction saw 2 fireball type objects fall, slow down and  change directions.
